text: Hey Chloe! I hope you’re well :) I managed to get myself some work experience at a Cardiff based VFX studio in Bad Wolf. The name of the studio is Painting Practice. I wonder if you’ve heard of them :’) I will be going for 2 weeks and will be doing work on pre/post visualisation. From an animation perspective, which do you think is better to specialise in? Pre or post visualisation?
